sentences: Ray Herrmann (born September 3, 1960) is an American saxophonist from Chicago, Illinois, United States.

His music has been played on The Weather Channel's local on the 8s segment with tracks such as "Cocoon", "Above the Horizon", "Park Place", "Northern Lights", "Under the Stars", "Tempest Wind" and "Was It You?"Herrmann has performed with the multi-platinum band, Chicago, occasionally filling in for original saxophonist Walter Parazaider on tour since 2005.
Herrmann was promoted to an official member in 2016.
Before joining the band Chicago, Herrmann was a Los Angeles studio musician performing with Bob Dylan and Carlos Santana.
